messages.title: A BETTER PLAN. A BETTER FUTURE.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop people who come here from claiming benefits for two years
Balance the books and cut the deficit

issues.economy: We will cut the deficit every year with sensible reductions in public spending, such as abolishing the police crime commissioners, saving over £50 million. And by closing tax loopholes, we will ensure the wealthiest and big corporations make a bigger contribution by clamping down on tax avoidance and abolishing non-dom status.
issues.education: We will guarantee that all teachers in state schools will be qualified. We will reduce class sizes to under 30 for 5, 6 & 7 year-olds.
issues.health: We will recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs. We will guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours.
issues.socialWelfare: We will get at least 200,000 homes built year by year by 2020.

housing.content: We will get at least 200,000 homes built year by year by 2020.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet compares Labour's policies with the Conservative government's record and outlines a plan for a better future. Key policy areas include the NHS, minimum wage, immigration, zero-hours contracts, the deficit, education, and housing.
